# Elixir of Vision
## Overview
**Aura** faint divination; **CL** 2nd

**Slot** —

**Price** 250 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

Drinking this elixir grants the imbiber the ability to notice acute details with great accuracy (+10 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks for 1 hour).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*

**Cost** 125 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 512
